Submodules¶

amazons.algorithms.algorithm module¶

class amazons.algorithms.algorithm.Algorithm¶

Bases: ABC

Interface for the algorithms of the system

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

abstract make_move(board, player)¶

Method to get the move chosen by the algorithm in a given position for a given player :param board: position of the game :param player: player to move :return: move chosen by the algorithm

amazons.algorithms.random_algorithm module¶

class amazons.algorithms.random_algorithm.RandomAlgorithm¶

Bases: Algorithm

Algorithm that chooses a random action

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

make_move(board, player)¶

Method to get the move chosen by the algorithm in a given position for a given player :param board: position of the game :param player: player to move :return: move chosen randomly
